Comments_List: I am now able to distinguish between different metaethical positions and to understand what motivates them.

Professor Darwall put together a very good syllabus which covered important topics across metaethics. I think the only complaint I have about the class is that because of the class size discussions could sometimes be disjointed.
Yes. It is technical and difficult but the distinctions in it are important to understanding moral philosophy.
